title: Is it possible to ask for a remake to be removed when it wasn't my fault?
body: I just tried to play a game at around 5pm on 16/1/17 and during the load in screen league cut me off. When i tried to reload in it said i couldn't connect to server even though my internet was on, so i checked server status and it said online. When it finally let me on i had a leaver(remake).

replies.body:
It's not possible to change the results of a match after they've been recorded by the gameservers, unfortunately. It sounds like your connection was *unstable* to our gameservers, so I'd recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all of your local network settings are configured properly for League.

If you encounter further issues with this after working through that guide, let me know.
